resources.string: You can enter another port to contact XBMC EventServer. Leave this as is if you haven\'t changed the port within XBMC.
The EventServer of XBMC is used to remotely control XBMC. The Android remote control screen won\'t work without the EventServer.
The IP or hostname of XBMC
Trying to contact XBMC. Please wait.

Couldn\'t connect to XBMC. Please recheck the IP and port.
System reported:
Trying to read your EventServer state. Please wait.
Username or password is wrong. Please check both and try again.
Trying to mute XBMC through the EventServer in order to see if the EventServer is reachable. Please wait.

Couldn\'t mute XBMC through the EventServer. Please check if UDP port 9777 is blocked in your firewall. If you are connecting through 3G please make sure that UDP port 9777 is forwarded in your router.

Everything worked. You can now finish the wizard and start using the remove.
Have fun.
